page.title: 09Helen's Wednesday In School
page.content: On Wednesday we have a whole school assembly which is where all the school gets together in the main hall at 10.20 and it finishes at about 11.00. In an assembly we sing two hymns and Mr. Hilliard, our current Headmaster, reads us a story. The first lesson in the afternoon is music with Mr.Want and Mrs.Albert. We use a tape called "Silver Burdett Music Scheme". We have books to go with the tape. Usually we sing along with the tape,doing things such as rounds. After music we have topic with Mr.Want. I think the topic is quite interesting. We tend to do different aspects of maths. This lesson ends at 3.20, that's when the bell goes to go home. In the evening I go to Aikido it is a good form of self defence. We need special costume for this.
